step.cmd: Enter Communities into the Search bar, select All Communities, and click the Manage link related to the active Community.
In the sidebar nav, select Administration>Login & Registration.
Select the Visualforce Page option from the picklist as the login page and use the lookup to select custom_login.
Select the Visualforce Page option from the picklist as the forgot password management page and use the lookup to select forgot_password.
Select the Visualforce Page option from the picklist as the change password management page and use the lookup to select reset_password.
Check the Allow external users to self-register checkbox.
Select the Visualforce Page from the picklist as the self-registration page and use the lookup to select CommunitiesSelfReg.

Assign registering users to the newly created Profile, either the cloned Customer Community Login User or the Customer Community User, and use the lookup to assign registering users to a default Account. Click Save.

taskbody.result: Login & Registration information for the Community is properly configured.
